value.name: TUTORIAL_INTRO_LECCION
value.text:
Hi, I'm #0#! I'm here to show you how to manage your Empire.

Let's get started!

value.name: TUTORIAL_AYTO_LECCION
value.text:
This is your Town Hall. It will let you train villagers.

To select the Town Hall, click on it.

value.name: TUTORIAL_ALDEANO_LECCION
value.text:
The bottom panel will show the available actions.

Click on the villager button to begin training a villager.

value.name: TUTORIAL_SELECCIONAR_ALDEANO_LECCION
value.text:
Well done! You have trained a villager.

Select it using the mouse!

value.name: TUTORIAL_MOVER_ALDEANO_LECCION
value.text:
When you select a unit, you can move it by clicking on the desired place of the map.

Try it, click on the selected area!

value.name: TUTORIAL_ARBOL_LECCION
value.text:
Villagers perform collecting tasks!

Click on a tree to cut it!

value.name: TUTORIAL_ESPERA_LECCION
value.text: It will only take a few seconds... :)

value.name: TUTORIAL_RECOLECCION_LECCION
value.text: When the cutting has finished, click on the resource to pick up the wood.

value.name: TUTORIAL_CONSTRUIR_LECCION
value.text: Well done! Now I will show you how to create buildings. First, click the BUILD button.

value.name: TUTORIAL_CASA_LECCION
value.text: The next step is to select the desired building. Choose House I"."

value.name: TUTORIAL_COLOCAR_LECCION
value.text: Now click on the terrain to choose the placement of the house. The construction will begin!

value.name: TUTORIAL_CABALLERO_LECCION
value.text:
Well done! You are ready for your first battle.

Click on this knight to select it!

value.name: TUTORIAL_ATACAR_LECCION
value.text:
Trolls are your enemies! Defeat them or they will eliminate you!

Click on the troll to attack him!

value.name: TUTORIAL_BATALLA_LECCION
value.text: The units are attacking each other right now. The bars over them show their life. Don't worry, they are just weak trolls!

value.name: TUTORIAL_ENHORABUENA_LECCION
value.text: Very good! Now you're ready to build the biggest Social Empire on Facebook! Good luck!!

value.name: TUTORIAL_ESPERAR
value.text: Wait for a villager to collect

value.name: MISC_FAVOR
value.text: Do you want to accept the favor?

value.name: STORE_EDIFICIO_REFUERZOS
value.text: Allows you to get reinforcements from your allies!

value.name: STORE_EDIFICIO_SACRIFICIO
value.text: Sacrifice a unit and obtain some resources back

value.name: STORE_EDIFICIO_TESORO
value.text: Discovers a collectible item every day

value.name: STORE_EDIFICIO_ESTABLO
value.text: Allows you to convert swordmans and archers to mounted units.

value.name: STORE_EDIFICIO_CRIADERO
value.text: Put two animals inside to make them breed.

value.name: STORE_EDIFICIO_ZEPPELIN
value.text: Allows you to build a zeppelin to explore the Ancient Sea!

value.name: STORE_EDIFICIO_BARCO
value.text: Allows you to build a ship to explore the Great Sea!

value.name: STORE_EDIFICIO_COLISEO
value.text: Allows your villagers to move faster and to queue more resources to gather.

value.name: STORE_EDIFICIO_ESTATUA
value.text: The statue increases your limit of 3 attacks per day to 4.

value.name: STORE_EDIFICIO_MINA
value.text: Allows your villagers to mine gold and stone very fast.

value.name: STORE_EDIFICIO_SERRADERO
value.text: Allows your villagers to cut down trees very fast.

value.name: STORE_EDIFICIO_MERCADO_ALIADOS
value.text: Allows you to collect the resource you desire with the aid of your allies.

value.name: STORE_EDIFICIO_MAQUINA_DEL_TIEMPO
value.text: Allows to change the terrain theme of your map!

value.name: STORE_EDIFICIO_RECLUTAMIENTO_ALIADOS
value.text: Allows you to obtain powerful units through new recruits!

value.name: STORE_EDIFICIO_MESA_REDONDA
value.text: Allows you to obtain rewards through friends aid!

value.name: STORE_EDIFICIO_HECHICERIA
value.text: Allows you to learn and cast magic spells!

value.name: STORE_EDIFICIO_MARAVILLA_SOCIAL
value.text: Raises your population limit up to 50 more units!

value.name: STORE_EDIFICIO_IGLESIA_1
value.text: Healers can restore the health of your units

value.name: STORE_EDIFICIO_CATEDRAL
value.text: Monks convert enemy units to your units

value.name: STORE_EDIFICIO_IGLESIA
value.text: Healers can restore the health of your units

value.name: STORE_EDIFICIO_DEMOLICION
value.text: Kamikazes explode and harm all nearby units and buildings

value.name: STORE_EDIFICIO_ELEFANTE
value.text: Elephants stomp the ground to stun nearby opponents

value.name: STORE_EDIFICIO_CUARTEL1
value.text: Anubis Avatar creates 2 shadows of himself to annihilate the enemy!

value.name: STORE_EDIFICIO_TAMBORILERO
value.text: The drums inspire your troops making them attack faster!

value.name: STORE_EDIFICIO_RINOCERONTE
value.text: Rhinos charge their enemies and make them fly away

value.name: STORE_EDIFICIO_TORRE_MOVIL
value.text: Defensive tower that can move. You can use it in attacks

value.name: STORE_EDIFICIO_PIRAMIDE
value.text: Use Mummy's 4 special attacks to defeat your enemies

value.name: STORE_EDIFICIO_TORRE_HIELO
value.text: Freezes enemy units for a time. While frozen, enemy units cannot move or attack.

value.name: STORE_EDIFICIO_TORRE_AGUA
value.text: Unleashes waves of water to throw away incoming enemies.

value.name: STORE_EDIFICIO_FORTALEZA_1
value.text: Entrench archers inside to increase attack power!

value.name: STORE_EDIFICIO_TORRE_ACEITE
value.text: Puts a barrier of flaming oil in front of it. The oil sets enemies in flames.

value.name: STORE_EDIFICIO_HEROES_ALTAR
value.text: Allows you to acquire special heroes!

value.name: STORE_EDIFICIO_HEROES_CEMENTERIO
value.text: Allows you to revive your lost heroes.

value.name: STORE_EDIFICIO_MARAVILLA
value.text: This wonder increases the #0# population limit by #1#

value.name: ERROR_GENERICO

value.name: ERROR_SYNC
value.text: Oh no! Things must no longer be in sync! Press ok to refresh the page and keep playing!

value.name: ERROR_TIMEOUT
value.text: Oh no! The connection with the server was lost! Press ok to refresh the page and keep playing!

value.name: ERROR_EXPIRADO
value.text: Oh no! Your session has expired! Press ok to refresh the page and keep playing!

value.text: We're experiencing problems with our servers, please check back later. 2

value.name: ERROR_SYNC_2
value.text: Oh no!  Things must not be in sync any more! Refresh the page to keep playing!

 · On the Battle Menu" button you'll see the status of the battle.
 · Once the battle is finished, most of your dead soldiers will resurrect on your empire!"

Welcome to the best adventure in Facebook!

value.name: POPUP_OPCIONES_BATALLA_CABECERA

value.name: POPUP_OPCIONES_BATALLA_DEFENSIVA_DESCRIPCION
value.text: All your units will hold position until approached. They will stop chasing the enemy and return to their original position in a while after the clash.

value.name: POPUP_OPCIONES_BATALLA_MEDIO_DEFENSIVA_DESCRIPCION
value.text: All your units will hold position until a siege engine hits, then all ranged units will go and crush it.

value.name: POPUP_OPCIONES_BATALLA_MEDIO_AGRESIVA_DESCRIPCION
value.text: All your units will hold positions until the enemy hits. Then part of your army that equals to the enemy troops will go and chase them.

value.name: POPUP_OPCIONES_BATALLA_AGRESIVA_DESCRIPCION
value.text: All your units will attack the siege engines right from the start and will return to the empire only when all are destroyed.

value.name: POPUP_MISION_CAMPAMENTO_PIE_ANIMALES

value.name: POPUP_MISTERY_SUBTITLE
value.text:
You can get one of the following!
Test your luck!

value.name: POPUP_FAV_TEXT
value.text: Add Social Empires in your favourites!

value.name: POPUP_MISION_CAMPAMENTO_PIE_GOLEM
value.text: A dangerous Golden Golem kidnapped an Anubis Avatar!  Help the egyptian warriors to save him!

value.name: POPUP_CAMPAMENTO_PIE_GOLEM
value.text: Now rescue the Anubis Avatar! Click on the refuge!

value.name: POPUP_MISION_CAMPAMENTO_FIN_PIE_GOLEM
value.text: As reward to save his life, the Anubis Avatar will join your ranks!

value.name: POPUP_MISION_CAMPAMENTO_PIE_YETI_NEGRO
value.text: Viking explorers have spotted a Black Yeti! Help them to defeat it!

value.name: POPUP_CAMPAMENTO_CABECERA_1_YETI_NEGRO
value.text: You and your viking friends smashed the

value.name: POPUP_CAMPAMENTO_PIE_YETI_NEGRO
value.text: Viking explorers have spotted a Black Yeti! Help them to defeat it!

value.name: POPUP_MISION_CAMPAMENTO_FIN_PIE_YETI_NEGRO
value.text: An axe viking will join your ranks as a token of gratitude for your help!

value.name: POPUP_MISION_CAMPAMENTO_PIE_VIBORA_GIGANTE
value.text: Neptune, king of Atlantis, has summoned a Giant Vyper to conquer your empire! Kill it before it's too late!

value.name: POPUP_CAMPAMENTO_PIE_VIBORA_GIGANTE
value.text: Congratulations, you vanquished the Giant Vyper! Click on its nest!

value.name: POPUP_MISION_CAMPAMENTO_FIN_PIE_VIBORA_GIGANTE
value.text: Neptune could not defeat you and returned back to the seas… plus you've found a dolphin fountain among the nest remains!

value.name: POPUP_MISION_FIREWORKS_FOOTER
value.text: Trolls have stolen the fireworks from a chinese camp when everybody was sleeping! Help them to retrieve it!

value.name: POPUP_MISION_FIREWORKS_UNIT
value.text: WE'LL HELP YOU ON THIS MISSION!

value.name: POPUP_MISION_FIREWORKS_FOOTER_END
value.text: The chinese warriors are happy again and give you a Dragon Statue to thank you for your help!

value.name: POPUP_MISION_VIKBEER_FOOTER
value.text:
Trolls stole the ale barrels from your Vicking friends!
Retrieve it so they can party again!

value.name: POPUP_MISION_VIKBEER_UNIT
value.text: ARRR! WE WANT OUR ALE BACK!

value.name: POPUP_MISION_VIKBEER_FOOTER_END
value.text: Vikings are happy again and can continue celebrating! They offer you a Viking Ship to thank you for your help!

value.name: POPUP_MISION_CAMPAMENTO_PIE_PRINCESA_END
value.text: WELL DONE! You rescued the princess! She joins your army to thank you for your help!

value.name: POPUP_MISION_CAMPAMENTO_PIE_ARQUEROS_END
value.text: WOW! You rescued the three archers! They now join your ranks as a token of gratitude!

value.name: POPUP_MISION_CAMPAMENTO_PIE_SOLDADOS_END
value.text: YOU ARRIVED ON TIME! You saved the soldiers from being boiled alive!

value.name: POPUP_MISION_CAMPAMENTO_PIE_TESORO_END
value.text: VICTORY! You retrieved the treasure stolen by the trolls!

value.name: POPUP_MISION_CAMPAMENTO_PIE_ALDEANOS_END
value.text: VERY WELL! Your rescued the villagers from a certain death!

value.name: POPUP_MISION_CAMPAMENTO_PIE_TROLL_END
value.text: BRAVO! You managed to save the troll! He will help you now!

value.name: POPUP_MISION_CAMPAMENTO_PIE_PRINCIPE_END
value.text: FANTASTIC! You saved your prince and now your empire can be properly managed again!

value.name: POPUP_MISION_CAMPAMENTO_PIE_FUEGO_END
value.text: AWESOME! You regained control of your wells again an could put off the fire on the fields and mill!

value.name: POPUP_MISION_CAMPAMENTO_PIE_CURANDEROS_END
value.text: PERFECT! You rescued the healers, and of them will join your ranks as a token of gratitude!

value.name: POPUP_MISION_CAMPAMENTO_PIE_PIEDRA_END
value.text: VERY WELL! You defeated the trolls and regained control of the stone mines!

value.name: POPUP_MISION_CAMPAMENTO_PIE_ALIADOS_END
value.text: BRILLIANT! You rescued your allies and they will help you to fight against the trolls now!

value.name: POPUP_MISION_CAMPAMENTO_PIE_ANIMALES_END
value.text: YOU DID IT! You saved the animals and now they are free again!

value.name: POPUP_MISION_CAMPAMENTO_PIE_ASEDIO_END
value.text: You retrieved the siege weapons and now you can use them against your enemies!

value.name: POPUP_MISION_CAMPAMENTO_PIE_ESTATUA_END
value.text: The statues hid treacherous skeletons and you defeat them all!

value.name: POPUP_MISION_THEMUMMY_FOOTER
value.text: Help the egiptians to retrieve the Gems of Power and prevent evil Anubis Priests from reviving his deceased Paraoh.

value.name: POPUP_MISION_THEMUMMY_FOOTER_END
value.text: YES! You killed the mummy! An egyptian joins your ranks to thank you for helping his people!

value.name: POPUP_MISION_AZTECALTAR_FOOTER
value.text: Take the sheeps and sacrifice them at the altar while you plead Aztec Gods to bring rain to your fields!

value.name: POPUP_MISION_AZTECALTAR_FOOTER_END
value.text: Aztec Gods will take rain to your fields to end with the hunger!

value.name: POPUP_MISION_ELFOSARBOL_FOOTER
value.text: Help the Elfs to destroy the infernal sculptures that drain the energy from the Life Trees!

value.name: POPUP_MISION_ELFOSARBOL_FOOTER_END
value.text: WELL DONE! You restored the Natural Balance on the woods. 2 Archer Elfs join your ranks as proof of gratitude!

value.name: POPUP_MISION_ELFOSARBOL_UNIT_SAY
value.text: WE ARE AT YOUR ORDERS, for the moment…

value.name: POPUP_MISION_CHINOSDRAGON_FOOTER
value.text: Three Draggies are wreaking havoc on fields and houses of your empire! Defeat them before they kill somebody!

value.name: POPUP_MISION_CHINOSDRAGON_FOOTER_END
value.text: GOOD JOB! You defeated the draggies, but the Furious Dragon fled to Nest Isle! Two grateful Chinese Archers join your ranks!

value.name: POPUP_MISION_CHINOSDRAGON_UNIT_SAY
value.text: HELP GOOD CHINESE, AND CHINESE WILL REWARD YOU!

value.name: POPUP_MISION_CHINOSDRAGON_BOSS_SAY
value.text:
YOU WON'T DEFEAT ME! I'll be waiting for you on my island...
If you dare to come, MUHAHAHA!!

value.name: POPUP_MISION_NEPTUCLEOPATRA_FOOTER
value.text: ¡Neptuno rescued Cleopatra from a shipwreck and now he has fallen in love with her! Help the egiptians to rescue her!

value.name: POPUP_MISION_NEPTUCLEOPATRA_FOOTER_END
value.text: WELL DONE! Neptune has fled to his dwelling in Mythical Isle… Follow him and defeat his army for good!

value.name: POPUP_MISION_NEPTUCLEOPATRA_UNIT_SAY
value.text: HELP US TO SAVE OUR QUEEN!

value.name: POPUP_MISION_ELFOSENT_FOOTER
value.text: The Ent has been bewitched by the Hell followers! Help the elfs to free him from the spell!

value.name: POPUP_MISION_ELFOSENT_FOOTER_END
value.text: You've destroyed the Hell servants and the Ent is now free! As a token of gratitude, and Elf Druid joins your ranks!

value.name: POPUP_MISION_ELFOSENT_UNIT_SAY
value.text: ¡LET'S FREE THE ENT FROM THE DEVIL SPELL!

value.name: POPUP_MISION_TESOROATLANTE_FOOTER
value.text: Help the Aztecs to retrieve their treasures, stolen by the Atlants from the sunken ship of Hernan Cortes!

value.name: POPUP_MISION_TESOROATLANTE_FOOTER_END
value.text: HURRAY! You helped the Aztecs to retrieve their treasures and they give you an Aztec Boss sculpture in return for your efforts!

value.name: POPUP_MISION_TESOROATLANTE_UNIT_SAY
value.text: HELP US TO RETRIEVE OUR TREASURES!

value.name: POPUP_MISION_BALROG_FOOTER
value.text: The Devil forces have sent the Balrog himself to defeat your empire! Inferno outsiders will join you to defeat him and his army!

value.name: POPUP_MISION_BALROG_FOOTER_END
value.text: CONGRATULATIONS! Balrog fled away claiming vengeance! An Inferno outsider will join your ranks to help you detect evil forces!

value.name: POPUP_MISION_BALROG_UNIT_SAY
value.text: WE'LL HELP YOU TO DEFEAT BALROG!

value.name: POPUP_MISION_MAGOSCORRUPTOS_FOOTER
value.text: A group of foul wizards stole the Orbs of Power. Retrieve them before the wreak havoc on your empire!

value.name: POPUP_MISION_MAGOSCORRUPTOS_FOOTER_END
value.text: YOU ARE THE BEST! You retrieved the Orbs of Power and defeated the Foul Wizard. The Red Wizard could be saved from his madness and joins your ranks!

value.name: POPUP_MISION_PERFORARROCAS_FOOTER
value.text: Help the Aztec warriors to defeat the ROCKDRILLER! Destroy the Serpent sculptures to get it out of its hole!

value.name: POPUP_MISION_PERFORARROCAS_FOOTER_END
value.text: YOU DID IT! The Rockdriller fled to Mineral Isle and now your empire is save! The aztec warriors join your ranks as token of their gratitude!

value.name: POPUP_MISION_DEMONPORTAL_FOOTER
value.text: Some Demonic Portals have appeared in you empire! Kill the demons that crossed and destroy all the doors!

value.name: POPUP_MISION_DEMONPORTAL_FOOTER_END
value.text: GREAT! You defeated all demons and destroyed the portals! Your empire is now save!

value.name: POPUP_SUPER_MISTERY_FOOTER
value.text: You will find your prizes in your storage!

value.name: POPUP_CEMENTERIO_DESCRIPCION
value.text: Here you can revive your units you've lost in battles!

value.name: STORE_EDIFICIO_CEMENTERIO
value.text: Here you can revive your units you've lost in battles!

value.name: POPUP_GRAVEYARD_HELP_TITLE
value.text: If you lose units during a combat, you can resurrect them at the Graveyard!

value.name: POPUP_GRAVEYARD_HELP_1
value.text: A portrait of your dead units and their number is displayed.

value.name: POPUP_GRAVEYARD_HELP_2
value.text: Resurrecting dead units costs half of their original price.

value.name: POPUP_GRAVEYARD_HELP_3
value.text: Click on the right button below the portrait of the unit to resurrect it using gold, food or cash.

value.name: POPUP_GRAVEYARD_HELP_4
value.text: You can also resurrect units with potions.

value.name: POPUP_GRAVEYARD_HELP_5
value.text: Ask your friends to send you potions using the 'Ask For' button at the lower right!

value.name: POPUP_GRAVEYARD_HELP_6
value.text: Once you have enough potions to resurrect a unit, the left button below the portrait (potion) will be highlighted.

value.name: POPUP_GRAVEYARD_HELP_7
value.text: Click on the potion button to revive a unit!

value.name: ISLANDS_NO_MORE_ATTACKS
value.text: You don't have more attacks now

value.name: ISLANDS_WINNER_FIRST_ISLAND
value.text:
Amazing!!! You did it!!! You are the King of Social Empires!!!

You deserve this amazing reward for such legendary victory!!! (Look at BUILD > Storage)

value.name: ISLANDS_PROGRESS_NEXT_ISLAND
value.text:
Congratulations, you defeated all the players on your isle!! You progress to the next one!

Your deed deserves a good prize! (Look at BUILD > Storage)

value.name: ISLANDS_HELP_TEXT
value.text:
- Conquer the rest of enemies' empires on your island to progress to the next one!
- You can also attack players from other islands to get lots of experience and gold!
- Each time you conquer an Island you earn 1 cash and a unit!
- Try to make it to Island 1 and win amazing prizes along the way!

value.name: ISLANDS_WAITING
value.text: Waiting for more players…Come Back in 5 minutes!

value.name: ALERT_NO_MORE_ATTACKS
value.text: You don't have more attacks now

value.name: POPUP_QUEST_DRAGON_2
value.text: Defeat the Deadly Dragon and his eggs!!

value.name: POPUP_UNIT_COLLECTION_COMPLETE_TEXT
value.text: You have completed a collection and here is your reward!

value.name: POPUP_LOADING_SURVIVAL_TEXT
value.text:
- Protect the central Relic from enemy attacks!

- Resist as much time as possible and win a unit!

- Your army will be made of 30 of your most powerful units!!

- Tip: First defeat the Bosses to stop the 8-direction enemies spawning!

- You won't lose any unit for playing this game mode!! :)

- If you beat the time and win a unit, check your storage to get it!

- Beat your best time, take a picture and send it to our forums!

value.name: SURVIVAL_USER_EXIT
value.text: Are you sure you want to exit the survival map?

value.name: ALERT_UNIT_COLLECTION_COMPLETED
value.text:
You've completed a Unit Collection! 
Go to Gift > Units to claim yor reward!

value.name: POPUP_PVP_BUY_TERRITORY_TEXT
value.text: Doy you want to conquer this territory?

value.name: STORE_EDIFICIO_SURVIVAL_ARENA
value.text: Allows you to play the Survival Arena mode!

value.name: STORE_EDIFICIO_WAREHOUSE
value.text: This building allows you to store 20 units... and more!!

value.name: ERROR_TIME_HACK

value.name: STORE_EDIFICIO_WONDER_CASH
value.text: This wonder provides you with 1 cash every day!

value.name: MOROCCO_DEALER_TEXT
value.text:
You can bargain this offer!
But don't make your dealer angry!

value.name: MOROCCO_DEALER_NEGOTIATE_TEXT
value.text: Ok, you win! Let's have a discount...

value.name: MOROCCO_DEALER_BYE
value.text: Dealer says: You are cheating too much!!! Bye!

value.name: HELP_POPUP_DRAGON_TEXT
value.text:
- Press the 'Take Care' / 'Feed' button under the image. Look how the progress bar at the top fills up.
- Wait until the timer reaches 0:00:00 or press the 'Speed Up' button below to complete the step.
- Repeat this process 10 times and press the 'Get Dragon!' button to get your dragon!
- Each time you get a draggy or dragon, you'll unlock the next one on the portrait strip below!
-Hire friends for multiple speed up progress. The more friends, the more steps you'll progress!

value.name: MEN_VS_WOMEN_DESC
value.text: Try out Social Wars today and enjoy some of our exclusive offers!

- If you win a tournament you'll get fantastic rewards!

value.name: POPUP_CRIADERO_NOOBINFO
value.text: Press take care" every 6 hours to get a powerful dragon."

value.name: POPUP_CRIADERO_NOOBINFO2
value.text: Press feed" every 6 hours to get a powerfull dragon."

value.name: POPUP_DRAGON_TAMING_MOUNT
value.text: Mount a Rider on a Dragon

value.name: POPUP_DRAGON_TAMING_NEED
value.text: To mount a dragon with a rider, you have to put both units into this building. You will obtain the dragon with more power.

value.name: POPUP_DRAGON_TAMING_CLICK_TAME
value.text: Click on 'Ride the Dragon' to mount the dragon with the rider.

value.name: POPUP_DRAGON_TAMING_HELP
value.text:
- HOW TO RIDE A DRAGON


1. Once you have got your rider in the Rider Academy, select it and put it in the Dragon Riding.

 2. Add your dragon to the Dragon Riding so the Rider can ride it!

3. Remember that the Rider and Dragon must be compatible so the riding can be successfully completed (check the Rider Academy for more details).

4. Once you have both Rider and Dragon in the building, press the 'Ride the Dragon' button to get your super powerful new unit!

value.name: POPUP_RIDER_TRAINING_INFO
value.text: Complete all the steps of the training to get the Dragon Rider and be able to upgrade your Dragon!

value.name: POPUP_RIDER_TRAINING_HELP_SELECT
value.text:
- HOW TO TRAIN A DRAGON RIDER

1. Select the Rider you like (warning: put the mouse over a Rider and you'll see the dragons he can ride below!)

2. You must demonstrate you are worthy of riding a dragon: complete all the adventures and reach the END! (each time you complete an adventure, your progress bar on top will fill out)

 3- You must wait some time before playing again (you also have a button to recover yourself quicker!)

4. When you complete the last adventure, press the Get Rider button to get your Dragon Rider!

5. Once you get your Rider, take it to the Dragon Riding Building! (check the Store)

value.name: POPUP_RIDER_TRAINING_HELP_TRAIN
value.text:
- HOW TO TRAIN A DRAGON RIDER

1. Select the Rider you like (warning: put the mouse over a Rider and you'll see the dragons he can ride below!)
2. You must demonstrate you are worthy of riding a dragon: complete all the adventures and reach the END! (each time you complete an adventure, your progress bar on top will fill out)
3. You must wait some time before playing again (you also have a button to recover yourself quicker!)
4. When you complete the last adventure, press the Get Rider button to get your Dragon Rider!
5. Once you get your Rider, take it to the Dragon Riding Building! (check the Store)

value.name: POPUP_RIDER_GAIN
value.text: This rider gives your dragon additional #0# attack and #1# health!

value.name: ALERT_DRAGON_RIDER_NOT_MATCHING
value.text: Your rider cannot mount this dragon. Check in the Rider Academy which dragons are a good match for him.

value.name: ALERT_DRAGON_RIDER_INCOMPLETE
value.text: Put one dragon and one rider in this building.

value.name: ERROR_STOLEN
value.text: Connection with server lost. Please refresh.

value.name: LIMIT_DAMAGE
value.text: Fill bar doing damage. When full, press bar to attack.

value.name: LIMIT_HEAL
value.text: Fill bar doing damage. When full, press bar to heal units.

value.name: LIMIT_STOMP
value.text: Fill bar doing damage. When full, press bar to charge.

value.name: STORE_DOME_PROTECTION
value.text: All your units within this dome will receive 50% less damage!!

value.name: STORE_DOME_TOWER_ENHANCER
value.text: This Tower Enhancer will make surrounding towers shoot 2x faster!!

value.name: LIMIT_HELP
value.text:
- Limit is the most powerful of all attacks.
- You can only find Limit attack on Dragons con Rider.
- There are 3 types of Limit: Charge, Ray Attack and Heal. Each dragon with rider uses one of these.
- Fill the bar button to activate Limit by killing enemies.
- Once it is activated click on the bar button to unleash the attack.
- Create your own Limit strategy attacking with different dragons with rider.

value.name: MONDAY_BONUS_POPUP_HEADER
value.text: Come back every Monday to get mysterious reward!

value.name: MONDAY_BONUS_POPUP_FOOTER
value.text: You will find your rewards in your storage

value.name: MONDAY_BONUS_POPUP_HEADER_MONDAY
value.text:
Here is your Monday reward!!
Choose a box and get your mystery reward!!

value.name: RELOCATE_CONFIRM
value.text: If you go to another island you'll lose your progress in this one, are you sure?

value.name: POPUP_HEAVY_SIEGE_INFO
value.text: Dragons are preparing to attack your empire!

value.name: HEAVY_SIEGE_POPUP_PRESENT_TEXT
value.text: You will find a new unit on your storage as a reward for your heroic deed...

value.name: TITLE_DESCRIPTION_DARTS
value.text:
- You get a free dart every day!

- Pop a balloon to get awesome prizes!

- Collect all units before the time expires to get the Bonus Reward!

- New Game prizes are introduced each week! Find the Darts icon on the game interface.

value.name: DARTS_COLLECT_FOR_EXTRA
value.text: Collect all units to get the Bonus Reward!

value.name: DARTS_CLICK_ON_PLAY
value.text: Pop the balloons and win amazing RARE prizes!

value.name: DARTS_THROW
value.text: Point a balloon and click to throw the dart!

value.name: DARTS_GIFT_BOX
value.text: Find this unit on your storage!

value.name: DARTS_COME_BACK
value.text: Come back next week for new prizes!

value.name: DARTS_WIN_EXTRA
value.text: Congratulations! You've won this amazing Bonus Reward for completing the collection!

value.name: DARTS_FREE_DART_POPUP
value.text: You've won a FREE dart! Play Darts now and win amazing RARE prizes!

value.name: POPUP_SELECT_YOUR_DRAGON_INFO
value.text: Choose the draggy that will help you on your adventure!

value.name: POPUP_SELECT_YOUR_DRAGON_2_INFO
value.text:
Get more dragons in the Dragon Nest!
Enter Now!!

value.name: POPUP_INACTIVE_NEST_INFO
value.text: To get more eggs and start again select a button below.

value.name: POPUP_MISSINGTOWNHALL_DESCRIPTION_ASSAULT
value.text:
INSTANT VICTORY

The village you are attacking has no townhall.

This means you WIN this round automatically!

value.name: POPUP_MISSINGTOWNHALL_DESCRIPTION_NORMAL
value.text:
WARNING

Your village has no townhall.

This means you will automatically lose if you are attacked by another player

value.name: POPUP_DRAGONS_HIRE_FRIENDS_POPUP_TEXT
value.text:
#0# friend/s accepted helping you to breed the dragon!

Click OK to speed up the progress.

value.name: POPUP_DRAGONS_HIRE_FRIENDS_INFO
value.text: Hire new friends to progress faster

value.name: POPUP_DRAGONS_HIRE_FRIENDS_TOOLTIP
value.text: For each new friend you hire, you will progress 2 steps instantly!

value.name: POPUP_BAHAMUT_SUPREME_TEMPLE_HELP_TEXT
value.text:
-GET THE MOST AWESOME DRAGON EVER!!

- Complete all steps to unleash the Supreme Bahamut Dragon.

- Each step takes 48h.

-Complete each step in the order you wish.

value.name: POPUP_BAHAMUT_SUPREME_TEMPLE_SURE_TO_SACRIFICE
value.text: Are you sure you want sacrifice the #0#?

value.name: TEMPLE_SUPREME_BAHAMUT_SACRIFICE_INFO
value.text:
Sacrifice a #0#.
To get it, first complete needed steps in the Dragon's Nest!

value.name: TEMPLE_SUPREME_BAHAMUT_COLLECT_INFO
value.text:
Offer the Supreme Heart.
To get it, first complete the Supreme Heart collection.
Find these collection items on Zeppelin Map 3 quests.

value.name: TEMPLE_SUPREME_BAHAMUT_GET_FINAL_DRAGON_INFO
value.text: Click the button to get the Supreme Bahamut Dragon!!

value.name: TEMPLE_SUPREME_BAHAMUT_SACRIFICE_BAHAMUT_INFO
value.text:
Sacrifice the #0#.
To get it, first complete the corresponding collection!
Find these collection items on the last 5 Zeppelin Map Quests.

value.name: TOOLTIP_STORE_SUPREME
value.text: This building allows you to invoke the Supreme Bahamut Dragon.

value.name: COMEBACK_BONUS_POPUP_HEADER_READY
value.text: Click on one of the gifts and get a FREE reward!

value.name: COMEBACK_BONUS_POPUP_HEADER_NOTREADY
value.text: Come back tomorrow and get one of the FREE rewards below!!

value.name: COMEBACK_BONUS_POPUP_FOOTER

value.name: POPUP_TIME_HEADER
value.text: Click on a button below to move forwards in time!

value.name: POPUP_QUEST_FORCE_RELOAD
value.text: Click OK to reload and go to your empire

value.name: POPUP_QUEST_ARMY_HEADER
value.text: Select your army for this Quest

value.name: VALIDATION_MSG_TIME_MACHINE
value.text: You need to buy this item before you can use it

value.name: POPUP_TIME_MACHINE_HELP_TEXT
value.text:
-Use the Time Machine to travel forward in time!!

-Thus you'll get resources sooner! It also speeds up PvP, Chapters, Quests, Daily Bonus, Dragon Nest, Rider Academy and much more!

-You have 6 different hourglasses, each one travels forward a different amount of time.

-Choose the one you need and press the USE button.

value.name: QUEST_TEAM_SELECTION_ALERT_1_UNIT
value.text: You must choose at least 1 unit

value.name: QUEST_TEAM_SELECTION_ALERT_LESS_20_CONFIRM
value.text: Are you sure you want to play with less than 20 units?

value.name: GODS_1
value.text: The 5 Elemental Gods created and ruled the world of Social Empires and kept peace amongst its dwellers...

value.name: GODS_2
value.text: ... but an unknown Evil force irrupted and many devilish creatures spawned and destroyed whole empires and killed its people...

value.name: GODS_3
value.text:
... After witnessing that, the 5 Elemental Gods decided to descend to the world of Social Empires with their Colossus and help to restore peace again!

Help them to achieve their goal!

value.name: POPUP_SEND_GIFTS_EXPLANATION
value.text: Send an awesome Surprise Box to your friends to help them build their empires!

value.name: POPUP_GET_ALLIES
value.text:
Get more allies to earn gold and XP every day 
 Get allies now!

value.name: STORE_HEAL_UNITS
value.text: Heals nearby units when they are not engaged in combat

value.name: TEAM_SELECTION_REQUIREMENTS_MSG
value.text: To enter this quest you need to have at least #0# unit/s from any of the following categories:

The items you bought on your
SE iPhone are in
Storage > Mobile Storage" now."

value.name: STORAGE_IPHONE_ITEMS
value.text:
The items you bought on your SE iPhone are in:
Storage -> Mobile Storage

value.name: GODS_4
value.text:
After the first epic battle, the Dark Evil God and its Chaos forces resisted ferociously,
thus the Elemental Gods retreated to gain more power.

value.name: GODS_5
value.text:
They summoned the 5 Genesis Gods who helped shaping the world during its creation.
With the help of their Colossus, all together will battle back the EVIL!

value.name: KOMPU_POPUP_DESC
value.text: Collect potions to break the cages that freeze these poor units and free them!

value.name: KOMPU_POPUP_HURRY_DESC
value.text: Use your gems to call the wizard now and get more potions!

value.name: KOMPU_CHANCES_DESC
value.text: Get water from the wizard. Each comment has a different chance of giving you potions. Choose wisely!

value.name: KOMPU_RESULT_CONGRATS
value.text: Congratulations! You have a successful potion!

value.name: KOMPU_RESULT_HINT
value.text: Tip: Remember, only the master wizard can create a 100% potion!

value.name: KOMPU_REWARD_DESC
value.text: Check your storage and enjoy your rewards!

Protect you Empire from other player' attacks, 
 safeguard your resources and boost you army to defeat 
 them all!

value.name: SOUL_MIXER_SUB_TITLE
value.text: Chose wisely 2 units, mix their souls and summon a third, stronger unit!

value.name: SOUL_MIXER_HELP_1
value.text: Combine your units and invoke a new powerful unit

value.name: SOUL_MIXER_HELP_2
value.text:
Give a boost to the new
creature with the Power-up
button

Start the invocation and press the Speed
Up button to get your unit faster.

Get your unit and continue exploring the
unique combinations.

value.name: UNIT_PACKS_AVALAIBLE
value.text: All units are right here! Choose the best Pack for you!

value.name: UNIT_WAREHOUSE_HELP_TEXT
value.text:
- Keep you units safe on the warehouse!

- There's no need to sacrifice your units because of lack of space!

- Click on a unit on your map and click on the warehouse to store it.

 - Click on a unit portrait to put it again on your map.

 - You can buy more space up to 200 slots!!
